titleStmt.title: Action upon the case for slander, or, A methodical collection under certain heads of thousands of cases dispersed in the many great volumns of the law, of what words are actionable and what not and of a conspiracy, and of a libel : being a treatise of very great use and consequence to all men, especially in these times, wherein actions for slander are more common than in times past : with an exact table annexed for the ready finding out of any thing therein / by W. Sheppard.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, William, d. 1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ch. Adams, J. Starkey, & T. Basset ...,

notesStmt.note: "A catalogue of lawbooks and such as appertaine to the law" p. [11-14] at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard Law School Library.
